name: Lupin Sansei: Shijou Saidai no Zunousen
overview: Lupin Sansei: Shijou Saidai no Zunousen (ルパン三世〜史上最大の頭脳戦〜?) is a Japan-exclusive 2D stealth/action video game based on the popular Monkey Punch characters. It was developed by Nex Entertainment and published by Namco Bandai Games, which was released in 2010.
